title: 你们的这个【新人任务②】个人象征 任务能完成吗
author: _jiao_jiao_
txt_content: 我这个任务怎么不能完成 上传头像的 emmm

replies.txt_content: 能啊   我看你头像已经上传了啊

replies.author: 叶烨子
replies.txt_content: mcbbs特性。

replies.author: 专刀你
replies.txt_content: 多试几次就是。

replies.author: sunting
replies.txt_content: 近期有多人反馈这个任务没法完成

replies.author: 亦音
replies.txt_content: 老特性了呢

replies.author: 带带大乌龟
replies.txt_content: 我也是。、完成不了

replies.author: 发光的原木
replies.txt_content: 特性（bug）而已，多试几次就好

replies.author: 匠灵工作室
replies.txt_content: 头像任务完不成。。

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 反正我看起来你已经上传成功了

replies.author: 寻一城
replies.txt_content: 我已经看见你的头像了

replies.author: Jinlve
replies.txt_content: 我也没完成得了这个任务

replies.author: LomOvO
replies.txt_content: 我也是，头像弄了

replies.author: slslwf4
replies.txt_content: 萌新报道

replies.author: tianchangrun
replies.txt_content: （盲猜你在领任务之前就把头像改了）

replies.author: 北极仙光
replies.txt_content: 现在这个任务有bug，等着修复吧

replies.author: DemooQAQ
replies.txt_content: 我也不能完成

replies.author: ISTBY
replies.txt_content: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊我也是

replies.author: ta很懒没留名字
replies.txt_content: 反正我完成了，你等几天

replies.author: 你猜猜啊w
replies.txt_content: 听他们说老bug了

replies.author: 凉白柑
replies.txt_content: 论坛老特性了（

replies.author: 十方_糖酒
replies.txt_content: 不能,直接放弃,去水帖升级

replies.author: 玩了四年MC
replies.txt_content: 我也是，上传了好多次都不行，所以我就不做那个任务了

replies.author: zhou12345654321
replies.txt_content: 老特性了，明天再看看通常就行了

replies.author: 是天一丫
replies.txt_content: 不知道   反正我的是没完成
